forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, this afternoon greets you with a soothing sunshine, offering a gentle warmth that dances around 64 degrees before softly retreating to about 61 as the day unfurls. Breezes from the west carry a crispness that invigorates the spirit, transforming an ordinary stroll into an embrace of the city's beauty. The sky remains mostly clear, filtering the light into a soft brilliance that invites both wanderers and those who prefer the comfort of their homes to relish in the charm of this vibrant locale.

As evening approaches, temperatures will settle around a cozy 50, kissing away the heat of the day. The gentle west-southwest winds will continue to whisper through the streets, making layers a wise choice for those venturing out later. Consider a light jacket or a snug sweater—perfect companions as you navigate the city's eclectic array of cafes or perhaps enjoy a leisurely book in one of the tranquil parks. With such clear skies above, it’s an ideal time for those low-key moments that invite reflection, or perhaps a simple gathering with friends to watch the sun dip behind the horizon, painting the evening in hues only San Francisco can conjure.
